DOC.brief_title: Effect Platelet-rich Factor Implant Stability Bone Resorption Lower Posterior Mandible
DOC.detailed_description: Dental implant place 30 subject 1 2 miss teeth side posterior mandible . Implants length 11.5 diameter 4.5 mm insert side . In one side PRF instill surface treatment PRF implant placement , PRF add side serve control group . All implant follow stability measurement mean resonance frequency analysis baseline , every two week 3 month . Bone height measure medial & distal side standardize IOPA x-ray .
DOC.criteria: patient 1 2 miss teeth side posterior mandible adequate bone quantity quality implant site implant site least 3 month heal extraction , patient well motivate implant therapy maintain good oral hygiene implant sit width length installation implant 4.5 mm x 11.5 mm .
